Class SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.BasicBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,ActivityClass,java.lang.Object>

        • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.framework.SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
  • Type Parameters:
    BusinessObjectClass - the business object class which is represented by the current wrapper
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SmartAdapters.SimpleBusinessViewWrapper
    Enclosing class:
    SmartAdapters

    public abstract static class SmartAdapters.BusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass>
extends SmartAdapters.BasisBusinessViewWrapper<BusinessObjectClass,android.app.Activity>
    The same exact purpose of its parent class, except that the ActivityClass type parameter is bound to the actual Android built-in class.
